devdoc.details: A token holder contract that can release its token balance gradually like a typical vesting scheme, with a cliff. Optionally revocable by the owner.

claimOwnership().details: Allows the pendingOwner address to finalize the transfer.

constructor.details: Creates a vesting contract that vests its balance of any ERC20 token to the beneficiary, gradually in a linear fashion. By then all of the balance will have vested.

params.beneficiary: address of the beneficiary to whom vested tokens are transferred
params.cliff: duration in seconds of the cliff in which tokens will begin to vest
params.revocable: whether the vesting is revocable or not
params.start: the time (as Unix time) at which point vesting starts

returns._0: the cliff time of the token vesting.
the initial share of the beneficiary.
the periodic share of the beneficiary.
the amount that has already vested but hasn't been released yet.
the amount of the token released.
the start time of the token vesting.
the total amount of the token.
the amount of the vested token.
true if the vesting is revocable.
true if the token is revoked.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to set the pendingOwner address.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

devdoc.title: TokenVesting

revoke(address).notice: Allows the owner to revoke the vesting. Tokens already vested remain in the contract, the rest are returned to the owner.
